creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black pieced square on diagonal with small embroided rosette at point at bottom front; batik bib at top has two black ties and is attached with narrow pink horizontal strip; three squares with intricate geometric embroidery in pink, white, gold at front bottom two sides with half diamond above; narrow embroidered horizontal strip at center with beads and tassels; tie loop at PR; cut loop at PL
title: Under Apron
